description:
Anubhav Sinha, known for films like Mulk, Article 15 and Thappad, reflects on his evolution as a filmmaker and the contradictions that shape his worldview. As he travels through smaller Indian cities to understand the fate of single-screen theatres, Sinha discusses audience expectations, the impact of OTT platforms, and why he finds nuance, “the grey,” far more honest than black-and-white narratives.

Southern Ocean carbon ‘anomaly’ reveals what models can still miss
description: For nearly two decades, computer models said stronger westerly winds and more greenhouse gases in the atmosphere would pump more carbon-rich deep water up towards the Southern Ocean’s surface, which would release carbon dioxide into the air. Yet new data has found the exact opposite has happened

title: 17-year-old gang-raped in fields; accused threaten to circulate video on social media
description: A 17-year-old girl was allegedly gang-raped by three men from her village who lured her into fields. The accused, who had previously threatened to release compromising videos, coerced her into meeting them. The girl reported the incident the next morning after being held overnight.

Khan, whose family has roots in Bangladesh, concealed his Indian identity to safely depart, while his tabla player remains stranded. He vows not to return until artists and cultural spaces are protected.

description: BJP secured the Kamptee municipal council president post for the first time in 40 years, with Ajay Agrawal winning by a narrow margin of 103 votes. The close contest saw allegations of malpractice from the runner-up, Congress' Shakur Nagani, who claimed a suspicious late shift in results.

title: The Jats draw up new power plans
description: Members of the community, who held significant power in north Indian politics for decades, have lost their grip on it over the past few years due to various social, political, and economic factors. New Delhi slammed attempts to equate protests targeting its facilities with a demonstration outside the Bangladesh High Commission in Delhi, calling them misleading propaganda.

title: Maha local body poll results: Mahayuti sweeps 207 posts; MVA restricted to 44
description: The BJP-led Mahayuti coalition has secured a decisive victory in Maharashtra's civic elections, winning nearly 207 out of 288 council and nagar panchayat president posts. This performance mirrors their assembly election success, with the BJP emerging as the biggest gainer. The results consolidate Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis's position and are seen as a significant win for the ruling alliance.

title: You learn when dealing with contrarian views: Filmmaker Anubhav Sinha

He defined "Hindus" as those respecting their motherland, irrespective of language or rituals, and urged Muslims to recognize their shared national and cultural identity.

title: North India shivers from intense cold, relief unlikely in 48 hours
description: North India is experiencing a severe cold wave with snowfall in higher reaches of Jammu and Kashmir, Ladakh, and Himachal Pradesh. Plains of Uttar Pradesh, Punjab, Haryana, and Rajasthan are facing dense fog and rain, pushing down temperatures. IMD forecasts continued wintry conditions for the next 24-48 hours.

title: 'Eggs in India safe for consumption': FSSAI rejects cancer risk claim; explains how
description: FSSAI has strongly refuted claims linking eggs to cancer, stating that eggs sold in India are safe. The authority clarified that the presence of nitrofuran metabolites below regulatory detection thresholds does not pose a health risk, as the use of these banned antibiotics is strictly prohibited in poultry production.

description: Sidney Crosby, the captain of the Pittsburgh Penguins, is one of the NHL's biggest stars, but he has kept his personal life private, as fans want to know more about his long-term relationship with Kathy Leutner, who has been there for him throughout his career, and their bond shows how Crosby's hockey success and Leutner's modeling success have come together. It gives us a look at their decade-long partnership behind the scenes.

title: Merry Christmas 2025: Wishes, messages to share with your loved ones
description: It's Christmas time and it is probably the best time to connect with your loved ones. Here is a list of over 50 curated messages for the different types of relationships you have in your life. They are unique and are loaded with emotions that will resonate with your different relationships.

title: The original 'Little Master': Hanif Mohammad, Pakistan’s first great Test batter
description: Pakistan's first cricketing icon, Hanif Mohammad, instilled a culture of resilience, teaching the nation how not to lose.  His extraordinary 970-minute innings against the West Indies in 1958, a testament to his defensive prowess and unwavering spirit, remains legendary.  This 'Little Master' transformed cricket into a sport for all, leaving an indelible mark on Pakistan's sporting identity.

title: 'His injuries have been strange': Gavaskar on Gill's omission from WC squad
description: Shubman Gill was dropped from India’s T20 World Cup 2026 squad due to poor form and injury concerns. Sunil Gavaskar advised Gill to take the decision positively and assured his future remains bright. Gavaskar called the move a “course correction,” adding that chief selector Ajit Agarkar would explain the decision personally.

title: 'Unusual': West mourns B'desh student leader's death; ex-diplomat flags anti-India agenda
description: Western embassies in Bangladesh issued condolence messages for student leader Sharif Osman Hadi. This move raised eyebrows due to Hadi's strong anti-India stance and his group's promotion of territorial claims. Questions arose regarding the consistency of Western support for democracy and minority rights with mourning a figure linked to a group advocating Sharia law. The incident highlights a diplomatic controversy.

description: Maharashtra's local body elections saw a significant win for the BJP-led Mahayuti alliance, securing a majority of councillor seats and municipal council presidencies. The ruling coalition attributed its success to development initiatives and strong organizational efforts. Opposition parties, however, alleged irregularities and unfair practices during the polls.

title: Watch: Nagar Kirtan dirupted in NZ; Sikh leader flags 'threat to religious freedom'
description: Shiromani Akali Dal president Sukhbir Singh Badal condemned the disruption of a peaceful Sikh Nagar Kirtan in New Zealand, calling it a threat to religious freedom and universal brotherhood. He praised the Sikh community for maintaining restraint despite provocation and urged external affairs minister S Jaishankar to raise the issue with the New Zealand government, as police intervened to ensure the procession could continue safely.

Khan alleges he and his wife are subjected to harsh solitary confinement and criticizes army chief Asim Munir, stating Pakistan is governed by 'Asim Law'.

He stated the party will oppose the new VB-G RAM G bill until the original employment guarantee framework is restored, vowing to expose the alleged fraud.

title: IND vs PAK Final: Naqvi presents trophy to U19 Asia Cup champs - Watch
description: Pakistan's U19 team secured a dominant 191-run victory over India in the Asia Cup final, preventing a repeat of the senior tournament's trophy presentation drama.  A stellar 172 by Sameer Minhas powered Pakistan to 347, a target India couldn't approach, falling for 156. Indian players collected medals separately, avoiding the ACC chairman.

title: The Watchlist: Why It's a Wonderful Life is the perfect movie to restore your faith in humanity
description: A late-night viewing of 'It's a Wonderful Life' offered unexpected solace and a profound reminder of life's value. The film beautifully portrays George Bailey's selfless nature and his struggle with perceived failure. Through a guardian angel's intervention, George realizes the immense impact of his quiet sacrifices, highlighting the significance of every life and the power of gratitude.

He suggested renunciation for those avoiding marriage. Bhagwat also shared insights from experts, recommending early marriage (19-25) and three children for health and ego management, while acknowledging his personal lack of experience in these matters.

While Mohammad Sayyam, Abdul Subhan, Huzaifa Ahsan took 2 wickets each.​​

description: India's ancient Aravalli Range faces a new definition crisis after a Supreme Court ruling. Critics argue this narrow view ignores the range's vital ecological functions, potentially opening it to unchecked mining and real estate development, threatening water security and climate stability.

Brittany Mahomes silent as Randi shares hope amid Patrick Mahomes recovery
description: Patrick Mahomes’ season-ending knee injury has left the Chiefs in unfamiliar territory. While Brittany Mahomes has remained silent, his mother Randi publicly thanked fans for their prayers and support. As Mahomes begins a lengthy rehabilitation, the Chiefs face a rare playoff miss but remain optimistic about his full recovery and return in 2026.

title: Aaron Rodgers’ heartfelt praise for his wife deepens mystery
description: Aaron Rodgers has confirmed he is married but continues to keep his wife, Brittani, completely out of the public eye. His heartfelt comments describing her as “incredible” have fueled curiosity, especially with no photos or appearances to confirm her identity. Rodgers’ rare openness highlights a deeply private love story unfolding away from the spotlight.

title: Lakers vs Clippers (Dec 20): Preview, lineups, injury report and how to watch
description: The Los Angeles Lakers, with a strong 19-7 record and recent offensive surge, face the struggling Los Angeles Clippers (6-21) tonight. The Lakers have been dominant since mid-November, especially with LeBron James healthy, while the Clippers are on an eight-game home losing streak. Luka Doncic led the Lakers to a season-high 143 points in their last outing.

title: 'Recovery isn’t optional': Why Chiefs Heiress Gracie hunt chose strength in 2025
description: Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt reveals she gained 15 lbs during her 2025 fitness journey, explaining why strength, recovery, and long-term health mattered more than appearance. The Kansas City Chiefs owner’s daughter shares how intentional training, muscle gain, and consistency helped her finish the year stronger than she started.

title: Anthony Joshua net worth 2025: Boxing earnings, career and Jake Paul fight payday
description: Anthony Joshua's net worth is estimated at £195 million in 2025, with the majority earned from boxing purses. He also generates significant income from endorsements and property investments. Joshua is set to earn a guaranteed £70 million from his upcoming fight against Jake Paul, a professionally sanctioned eight-round heavyweight bout.

title: Meta’s AI chief unhappy: Wang calls Zuckerberg ‘suffocating’; makes micromanagement claims
description: Meta's $14.8 billion investment in Scale AI and the integration of its CEO, Alexandr Wang, into a new "superintelligence" lab are reportedly facing internal friction. Wang allegedly finds Mark Zuckerberg's micromanagement "suffocating," while some staff question Wang's experience. This shift also clashes with Meta's open-source AI philosophy, leading to executive departures.

title: From soap to serums: Indian men’s skincare upgrade — Have they moved beyond shaving cream
